name: mylar3
description: Mylar3 is an automated comic book downloader and manager. It can monitor series, download issues, and organize comic archives with integration for download clients and metadata tools.
features: Series Monitoring: Automatically track comic book series and monitor for new issue releases across multiple sources.
Download Automation: Integrate with download clients like SABnzbd and NZBGet for automated comic book downloading.
Metadata Management: Fetch and organize comic metadata including covers, descriptions, and publication information.
Archive Organization: Automatically rename and organize comic files using customizable naming conventions and folder structures.
Quality Control: Set preferred quality settings and automatically upgrade comics when better versions become available.
Reading Lists: Create and manage pull lists, reading queues, and custom collections for better library organization.
Web Interface: Manage your comic collection through a responsive web-based interface accessible from any device.
Search Integration: Connect with multiple comic databases and indexers to find and download missing issues.
Notification System: Receive alerts for new releases, download completions, and system events via email or webhooks.
Statistics Dashboard: View collection statistics, download history, and reading progress with detailed analytics.
Multi-format Support: Handle various comic archive formats including CBZ, CBR, and PDF files.
Backup Tools: Export library data and create backups of your comic collection metadata and settings.
